00037    template<class Map> class KeySet
00038    {
00039    public:
00040 
00045       typedef typename Map::key_type value_type;
00046

00054       {
00055       public:
00056          
00060          const_iterator(typename Map::const_iterator it)
00061             : Map::const_iterator(it) {}
00062

00068          {
00069             return (Map::const_iterator::operator*()).first;
00070          }
00071 
00072       }; // KeySet::const_iterator
00073

00075

00080

00082 
00092       KeySet(const Map* const pKeyMap=0) : pMap_i(pKeyMap) {}
00093

00098       {
00099          pMap_i = pKeyMap;
00100       }
00101 
00106       const_iterator begin() const
00107       {
00108          assert(0!=pMap_i);
00109          return const_iterator(pMap_i->begin());
00110       }
00111 
00117       const_iterator end() const
00118       {
00119          assert(0!=pMap_i);
00120          return const_iterator(pMap_i->end());
00121       }
00122 
00127       int size() const
00128       {
00129          assert(0!=pMap_i);
00130          return pMap_i->size();
00131       }
00132 
00139       const_iterator find(const value_type& k) const
00140       {
00141          assert(0!=pMap_i);
00142          return const_iterator(pMap_i->find(k));
00143       }
00144 
00148       bool contains(const value_type& k) const
00149       {
00150          return 0!=pMap_i->count(k);
00151       }
00152 
00153    }; // class KeySet

00174    template<class Key, class Val> class RefMap
00175    {
00176    public:
00177 
00181       typedef std::map<Key,Val> PtrMap;
00182 
00183       typedef typename PtrMap::const_iterator const_iterator;
00184 
00185       typedef typename PtrMap::value_type value_type;
00186 
00187       typedef typename PtrMap::value_type key_type;
00188 
00189       typedef typename PtrMap::mapped_type mapped_type;
00190 
00191    private:
00192 
00197       const PtrMap* pMap_i;
00198 
00199    public:
00200 
00204       RefMap(const PtrMap& map) : pMap_i(&map) {}
00205 
00210       const_iterator begin() const
00211       {
00212          return pMap_i->begin();
00213       }
00214 
00219       const_iterator end() const
00220       {
00221          return pMap_i->end();
00222       }
00223 
00235       const Val& operator[](Key key) const
00236       {
00237          typename PtrMap::const_iterator it = pMap_i->find(key);
00238          if(pMap_i->end()==it)
00239          {
00240             throw NoSuchElementException("sum::util::ReMap::operator[]",
00241                   "No such key in this RefMap");
00242          }
00243 
00244          return it->second;
00245 
00246       } // operator[]
00247 
00251       const_iterator find(Key key) const
00252       {
00253          return pMap_i->find(key);
00254       }
00255

00260       {

00262       }

00264    }; // class RefMap
